medical_history.chief_complaint: Hirsutism, hair loss on the scalp, and deepening of voice.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has a 3-year history of hair growth on her face, with prominent symptoms including increased hair growth on her abdomen, hair loss primarily on the top of her head, deepening of voice, growth of skin tags, and increased libido over the past year. Symptoms have worsened recently.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypothyroidism, hypertension, interstitial cystitis, gastroesophageal reflux disease, degenerative arthritis, carpal tunnel syndrome, vitamin D deficiency, positive anti-nuclear antibody test, and previous surgeries including cesarean sections, total hip replacement, cholecystectomy, and tonsillectomy.
medical_history.family_history: Mother had hypertension and breast cancer; one brother has diabetes mellitus; another brother has hypertension and hyperlipidemia; no family history of gynecologic cancer.
medical_history.social_history: The patient occasionally drinks alcohol, does not smoke, and does not use illicit drugs. She lives with her husband and has adult children.
